entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
